“What binds provisions?
What is the receptacle for wealth?🔽What surrounds a person?
What in the world is hard to abandon?
What do many beings get bound up in,
like a bird in a snare?”
“Faith binds one to the offering of alms,
and glory to the enjoyment of wealth.
Desire roams around a man,
desire is hard to abandon in the world.
What do many beings get bound up in,
like a bird in a snare?”
